statements: SELECT * FROM teaching_resources WHERE educator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT resource_name, created_date FROM teaching_resources WHERE educator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT resource_id, educator_id, resource_type FROM teaching_resources WHERE resource_type = 'video' ORDER BY educator_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM teaching_resources WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT educator_id, COUNT(resource_id) AS total_resources FROM teaching_resources GROUP BY educator_id HAVING COUNT(resource_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM teaching_resources ORDER BY created_date DESC, resource_name ASC
SELECT educator_id, COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM teaching_resources GROUP BY educator_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM teaching_resources WHERE educator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT educator_id FROM teaching_resources WHERE resource_type = 'video'
SELECT resource_name, created_date FROM teaching_resources WHERE educator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY created_date ASC
SELECT * FROM educators;
SELECT educator_name, specialization FROM educators WHERE teaching_subject='Math';
SELECT educator_id, educator_name, specialization FROM educators ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT educator_name, teaching_subject FROM educators WHERE specialization='Science' ORDER BY educator_name DESC;
SELECT educator_id, educator_name, teaching_subject FROM educators WHERE specialization='History' AND educator_name LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT educator_name, specialization FROM educators WHERE specialization = 'Math';
SELECT educator_name, specialization, teaching_subject FROM educators ORDER BY educator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM teaching_resources WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT educator_name, resource_name, resource_type FROM educators JOIN teaching_resources ON educators.educator_id = teaching_resources.educator_id;
